_header: A Jesu Thou shed Thy blood / For dred of thine thou wist sold be
_description: Hours of the Cross — eighteen 8-line stanzas

Chicago31.First Lines:
A Ihesu yow sched þi blodeFfor dred of pyn þu wyst sold
                    beOf þi body þat is so godeMihty merciful ande
                    fre…
Chicago31.Last Lines:
…Ande thynk þou bowght us on þe treSwet ihesu
                    þou swete þi blode
Chicago31.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “Two Fourteenth-Century Mystical Poems.” 
             Modern Language Review
         35 (1940): 320-9: 323-5.
